Why Seychelles Offshore ?

  • 01. Seychelles has a fast and efficient Registry (name and incorporation usually same or next day)
  • 02. Convenient world time zone – GMT+4
  • 03. Low IBC incorporation and renewal fees set for life
  • 04. Double Taxation Avoidance Treaties in force with China, South Africa, Indonesia, Oman, Botswana, Mauritius, Thailand, Malaysia, Vietnam with others in the pipeline

Seychelles also has a wide range of offshore products available, namely :

  • Seychelles International Business Companies (IBCs) – no-tax offshore company
  • Seychelles International Trusts
  • Seychelles Special Licence Companies (CSLs) – low tax resident company
  • Seychelles Limited Partnerships (LPs)
  • Seychelles Protected Cell Companies (PCCs)
  • Seychelles International Trade Zone (SITZ) companies licensed to operate in the Seychelles Freeport
